pymagic.transfer_tools.Local¶

class pymagic.transfer_tools.Local[source]¶

Bases: object

Functions for accessing local files.

Methods

fix_user_path

Fixes a local filepath.

get_all_filetimes

Creates a Pandas DataFrame of filenames and file times in a given directory.

get_latest_file

Get the latest file in a directory.

read_files_like

Reads and concatenates files in a directory that match a string.
classmethod fix_user_path(dir)[source]¶

Fixes a local filepath.

Parameters

dir – Directory to patch.

Returns

Patches directory.

classmethod get_all_filetimes(dir, exclude=False)[source]¶

Creates a Pandas DataFrame of filenames and file times in a given directory.

Parameters

  • dir – Directory of files.

  • exclude – A string to search for files to exclude.

Returns

Pandas DataFrame of filenames and file times to a directory.

classmethod get_latest_file(name, dir, exclude=False)[source]¶

Get the latest file in a directory.

Parameters

  • name – String match name of file(s)

  • dir – Directory for the file search

  • exclude – A string to search for files to exclude.

Returns

Name of most recent file.

classmethod read_files_like(name, dir, ext_typ, sheet_name=False)[source]¶

Reads and concatenates files in a directory that match a string. Returns a Pandas DataFrame.

Parameters

  • name – A string search to match.

  • dir – Directory to search for files in.

  • ext_typ – Extension type to search for (.XLSX OR .CSV)

  • sheet_name – If extension type is not “.CSV”, specifies the sheet number or sheet name to read.

Returns

Concatenated Pandas DataFrames that match a string.
